learned High Court judge had Justified these omissions, on the basis that, the statement was
made  after  about  10  months  since  the  incident  and  he  had  given  evidence  in  Court  after
about 13 years since the incident. When evaluating the weight of the evidence, it is my view
that  the  learned  Trial  Judge  had  considered  the  trustworthiness  of  the  testimony  and  the
demeanour and deportment of witnesses, and had rightly concluded that the contradictions
and omissions do not go to the root of this case.
